item.title: Creating a rainfall forecasting dashboard of Kerala, India. A non-shiny dashboard for all seasons.
item.description: A non-shiny dashboard for all seasons Ideas and implemenation Let’s dive in Part 1 - Tabulizer helps but.. Part 2 - Flexdashboard and leaflet is a great combo. Part 3 - Automation using Github actions. A non-shiny dashboard for all seasons Dashboards are exciting tools to present an idea in the most human-friendly form available. Ideas are infectious it took some time to fix the theme of my dashboard will be ‘Rainfall forecast of Kerala’.

item.title: Can you identify this legendary malayalam novel ? A ggwordcloud experiment in R
item.description: A legendary novel Yesterday out of nowhere the masterpiece novel, which changed the course of Malayalam literature forever pop up in my social media feed. After reading the digital copy (.epub) of the same, the idea for this article came into my mind. All I have for you is “words”. Create a word cloud using R First of all, load necessary R packages. {readtext} and {tidytext} for load our novel.
